attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To abolish fees for University places for English, Welsh and Northern Irish students bringing them in line with Scottish students who will be funded by Taxpayers from 2009 and therefore have FREE university education.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
